data.name: Birmingham Party Bus Trip
data.description:
Come and join us for a fun night out at Birmingham Pryzm! We’ll be departing from campus at 20:30 via the Party Bus to Birmingham and arriving back at 3:45am. Tickets are £15 for pick up & drop off and include free entry to the club! 

(Transport from Leamington Spa tbc) 
Use the promo code ENGSOCWARWICK at checkout!

data.name: Christmas Market Trip
data.description: Join us for an amazing EngSoc Birmingham Christmas Markets trip this Sunday to get in the festive spirit! We will be leaving from campus and meeting at Coventry train station to depart at 14:30. Alternatively, you can also meet us at Birmingham New Street station at 14:52. During the day, we will be shopping, stopping off at coffee shops and exploring all the different stalls on offer in the evening!

data.name: JLR EngCafe
data.description:
Join us for our JLR EngCafe! 2 PDR POINTS AVAILABLE!

Jaguar Land Rover is internationally-renown luxury car manufacturer with amazing opportunities in stock for students. This Thursday, a Warwick engineering graduate will be joining us to talk about the experiences at JLR, their thoughts working in the automotive industry and tips and tricks to succeed in general commercial internships within the company. 2 PDR Points will be  available for this event!

data.name: Lab Report Writing Session
data.description: Do you feel that writing a lab report can be difficult and hard to structure? Do you find that writing a lab report can be stressful and confusing? If so, this event is for you. Come along on the 24rd of November, where we will go through step by step the structure of the report, how to gain marks, and what the mark scheme requires for a top tier report.
